articles.description: Britney Spears took a hair clipper to her own hair in the midst of a devastating breakdown in 2007 and shared her reasons with one woman
articles.content:
When Britney Spears suffered a tragic breakdown in 2007, she endured it in the most public of ways. 
 As the former Disney star's life unravelled over the space of 14 months, each heartbreaking step… [+3642 chars]
